text: Abraham fozir puvatɨ, God manmaghɨn uan akar dɨkɨrɨzim damightɨ an otivam. Egha a guizbangɨra nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikia, bizir aghuir a fogha iniamiba bagha mɨzuai iti. Egha kamaghɨn a “Kantrin avɨribar afeziamɨn oto.” Godɨn Akɨnafarim mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, “Nɨn ovavir boriba bar avɨrasemegham.”
